title: Calories in 4 Piece Chicken McNuggets
meta_description: Discover calories in 4 piece chicken mcnuggets, including full nutrition breakdown, protein, fat, carbs, and tweaks for sauces or variations.
assumptions: Standard McDonald's-style Chicken McNuggets, breaded and fried; approximately 44g per piece; no dipping sauce included.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, recipe, portion size, and frying method. Check labels or official sources for exact values.

quick_answer.text: 4 piece chicken mcnuggets contain about 170 kcal and 9 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Baked instead of fried (hypothetical lower-fat version)

faqs.q: How many calories in one chicken mcnugget?
faqs.a: About 43 kcal per piece based on standard 4-piece serving data.

faqs.q: What is the protein in 4 piece chicken mcnuggets?
faqs.a: Approximately 9 g protein for the 4-piece serving.

faqs.q: Do chicken mcnuggets have a lot of sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, 4 pieces have around 340 mg sodium, mostly from breading and seasoning.

faqs.q: How do calories change with dipping sauce?
faqs.a: Adding a sauce packet can add 45-60 kcal; choose low-cal options to minimize.

faqs.q: Are these values for McDonald's specifically?
faqs.a: Based on typical fast-food chicken mcnuggets like McDonald's; other brands may vary slightly.
